sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_176383_star_wars_talents"> <x_176383_star_wars_talents action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <campaigns/> <description>(Maneuver) Before making a social interaction check, the character may perform a Greased Palms maneuver and spend up to 50 credits per rank of Greased Palms. For every 50 credits spent, the character upgrades the ability of the skill check once. How the money accomplishes this can be up to the player and GM, but could take the form of bribes, buying gifts, or even purchasing information that gives the character an advantage in the ensuing interaction.</description> <field_to_update/> <force_talent>false</force_talent> <how_much_to_add/> <name>Greased Palms</name> <number>TAL0001273</number> <passive_or_active>active</passive_or_active> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2020-11-12 05:20:41</sys_created_on> <sys_id>b8414c3f2fdca090e0f497eef699b6a4</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2020-11-12 05:20:41</sys_updated_on> <table_to_update/> </x_176383_star_wars_talents> </record_update>
